newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY TO PUBLISH MOL OFFERING THURSDAY.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY TO PUBLISH MOL OFFERING THURSDAY.

text.p: The state privatisation agency APV will announce details of a planned global and domestic offering of shares in the oil an gas company MOL on Thursday at 0500 GMT on Reuters screens, APV said on Wednesday.
MOL closed on the Budapest Stock Exchange at 3,105 forints on Wednesday, up 45 forints.
